sources.title: Law Rides, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Law Rides (1936) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Harley Wood, Buck Connors 
Director: Robert N. Bradbury

Hank Davis kills Jack Lewis to get his gold mine. Bruce Conway brings him in but then realizes Davis is the only one that knows where the mine is. Bruce and his pal Whitey rescue Davis from the lynch mob only to have Davis' gang catch them and leave them in the desert to die.

metadata.Plot: Hank Davis kills Jack Lewis to get his gold mine. Bruce Conway brings him in but then realizes Davis is the only one that knows where the mine is. Bruce and his pal Whitey rescue Davis from the lynch mob only to have Davis' gang catch them and leave them in the desert to die.
